title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a tax credit to farmers to offest high energy prices, to encourage the use of renewable energy, and to reduce prices to consumers.
content: Renewable Power for Agriculture Incentive Program Act of 2008 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a business-related tax credit for excessive fuel costs for creditable fuel used by a taxpayer in the trade or business of farming. Defines excessive fuel cost as the excess amount paid for creditable fuel over the adjusted base price for such fuel . Terminates such credit after 2013.
